messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please review the annual leave request for oracle sent monday re update please review annual leave request for makes absolutely sense member reports can work multitude projects different customers makes sense assigning him code for his line annual leave sickness or any other individual information requests should go his line manager should only be signing any or puts through codes thanks sent monday update please review annual leave request for dear further our recent communication we believe your below query resolved if you with resolution there need for response however please let know if we can be any further assistance matter reference number summary please review annual leave request for resolver resolution notes sent re please review annual leave request for hi please note leave request passing through following approval flow manager manager leave request came you because assigned code where you set approver if you approve request go next approval stage manager case be assigned mentioned code you be approving his leave requests please let know we could remove if further assistance needed hesitate let know kind regards applications analyst en description sent monday re please review annual leave request for morning should be receiving these have copied can make necessary changes paths receives these but ask you confirm with okay with him when returns next week thanks sent please review annual leave request for requested annual leave before you please review annual leave allowance details days allowed days already taken days remaining amount annual leave requested give balance following remaining days you required request by selecting accept or decline option if you accept database be updated with information if you decline rejection reason be sent requestor regards guide for approving or rejecting request open or go tab link located top left side screen select requests menu option double click specific pending approval request list click view form button view request details modified fields marked with red asterisk hold your mouse over asterisk original field value enter your comments comments field authorize request by pressing accept or decline buttons for any or technical issues with please contact kind regards ext ref msg

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket into one of the listed categories: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, or Administrative rights. The text seems to focus on annual leave requests, approvals, and manager interactions, making "HR Support" the most relevant category. While it mentions aspects of access control, the main topic revolves around the HR process for leave requests and approvals, confirming "HR Support" as the right choice.**Preparing JSON Response**

I need to respond with a JSON category object as per the required format. The instruction specifies to use a string enumeration for the category, so I'll format it as {"category":"HR Support"}. I want to keep the response concise and clear. The user asked to categorize the IT ticket by providing the relevant text, indicating they want a straightforward category. I'll confirm the allowed categories include "HR Support," so I'll deliver the final output as planned.
